titleStmt.title: The true grounds of ecclesiasticall regiment set forth in a briefe dissertation. Maintaining the Kings spirituall supremacie against the pretended independencie of the prelates, &c. Together, vvith some passages touching the ecclesiasticall power of parliaments, the use of synods, and the power of excommunication.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "by Mr. Hen: Parker".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
